description: This file implements a React component for a page that allows users to connect their JIRA and Confluence accounts through backend API interactions. It handles user authentication states, displays feedback messages, and manages connection flow including redirecting upon success.

methods.name: ConnectPage
methods.description: Main React functional component providing UI for connecting JIRA and Confluence integrations.

methods.name: handleConnect
methods.description: Handles the connection process for a given provider ('jira' or 'confluence') including API call, error handling, and redirect.
